body: I hate with all my soul's strength the NTR genre, not because of the actual plot, which is a dumb shitshow (although I hate from time to time), but because all "MCs" are humongously stupid, getting me to the point where I start to doubt the intelligence and sanity of the authors. Are the MCs' IQ 0 or -100? or is just that the stereotype* of the NTR genre is to make them all look like a bunch of brainless shitcunts.
